summary: An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.
cast: Bill Pullman|Cathy Tyson|Zakes Mokae|Paul Winfield|Brent Jennings|Conrad Roberts|Badja Djola|Theresa Merritt|Michael Gough|Paul Guilfoyle|Dey Young|Aleta Mitchell|William Newman|Jaime Pina Gautier|Evencio Mosquera Slaco|Kimberleigh Aarn|Philogen Thomas|Ana Rosa Smith Avila|Francis Guinan|Sally-Anne Munn|Jean-Baptiste Rosvelt|Robert De James|Jackson Delgado|Barbara Guillaume|Betty García Rodríguez|Luis Tavare Pesquera|Claudia Pimentel|Michael Jackson|Diamanda Galás|Ti-Blanc|Marie Carmel Noel|Frantz Thomas|Johnny Pephanon|Lucienne Charles|Suzette Cajusle|Rosemary Sylvain|Iversose Beuville|Maxo Fercilien|Jacques Achilles|Francesco Chavez|Saveur D'Orlean|Maurice Altenor|Miguel Valdez|Elías Gastavo|Harold Désiré|Buche|Providenia Alcántara|Dikatel Charles|Ana Ramirez|Rosa Bautista|Juliana José|Josiana Sant Louis|Jean Pierre|Otilio Nerius|Venat Ruis|Ramon Cherry|Rosa Charles|Luis Telemako|Federico Núñez|Americo José|Gérard Matonbe|Robert Regaldo|Jean Jean
title: La serpiente y el arco iris
